title: New Creator: In The Lab
body:
Bio
In The Lab is a premier basketball lifestyle brand, helping shape athletes through innovative and interactive experiences both on and off the court and deepening the level of fan engagement through the art of filmmaking, visual content and apparel. We say that it takes 10,000 hours of dedicated, focused and committed practice to master your craft. Every day we're all In The Lab working together to achieve our own personal feats of mastery and greatness. 

We want to push people to achieve multiple breakthroughs within their lifetime. Breakthroughs are key components to growth, building confidence and taking a positive step forward in life. These are life-changing moments that act for the better and have an impact on the future. Over the years In The Lab has built an amazing community of individuals around the world who believe in and preach our message. This has allowed people to come together to work on their goals, creating an online family that spans the entire world. 

Socials
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC47hfsRhwO1GIKe7UzbeoJA
https://twitter.com/devinthelab

Use Cases
Distribution - This will be done through giveaways, purchasers of our apparel, in-person + fan event rewards, and prizing for social media contests.
Holding - Discord bot added to our 4k+ user server, give holders a chance to be in our YT videos, visiting HQ in LA, helping vote on apparel designs, and more as we learn and grow.
Transactions - Custom/limited/exclusive coin-purchase apparel, FT calls with our team, Meet & Greets, LA gym visits, ticketed events.

Grant Tier
$2000

A 'yes' will approve this $ITL/$LAB proposal and a $2000 gift coin grant from the treasury
A 'no' will deny this prop.
author: 0x5ea400d06Afe7aebae54216aDfD7a4bF5f15F993
